page.title: 01HINTON CHARTERHOUSE
page.content: THIS AREA IS SITUATED S.E. OF BATH, ON THE AVON-SOMERSET BORDER. THE LAND AROUND THE MAIN SETTLEMENT,{HINTON {CHARTERHOUSE,}IS MOSTLY USED FOR AGRICULTURAL PURPOSES, BOTH DAIRY AND ARABLE. THE QUIET,WEST-COUNTRY VILLAGE LIES ON THE FRINGES OF THE MENDIPS, ABOUT 7 KM. S.S.E. OF BATH. IT GETS ITS NAME FROM THE NEARBY PRIORY, WHICH USED TO HOUSE CARTHUSIAN MONKS. THE MAIN ROAD THROUGH THE AREA IS THE{A36}BATH TO WARMINSTER ROAD, AND OTHER BUSY ROUTES ARE THE{B3110}AND THE{A366.} THE VILLAGE CENTRE CONTAINS 2 PUBS, A GENERAL STORES, A POST OFFICE, GARAGE SERVICES, A CHURCH AND A FORMER SCHOOL. THE AREA ALSO INCLUDES THE OUTSKIRTS OF A SMALL,NEIGHBOURING VILLAGE, ABOUT 3KM. EAST, CALLED{FARLEIGH HUNGERFORD.
